Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council's Children and Young People's Directorate. Free transport is available for children aged 8 years and under who live 2 miles or more from their catchment school and children aged 8 to 16 years who live over 3 miles from their catchment school. Children with disabled parents and children unable to walk to school because of special educational needs or mobility problems may be entitled to free transport. Free transport is also now available to children who are entitled to free school meals or whose parents receive the maximum level of Working Tax Credit in certain circumstances, please telephone for details.
